post:
Hello all,

OVH has some brand new AMD servers for their game server line which are available on our website now in locations Frankfurt and Montreal. We offer a huge discount of 30% for members here using code ‘HOSTBALLS’. Stock is limited though!

What you get with this offer (all specs can be upgraded):

  • KVM VPS with Virtualizor control panel.
  • 1 vCPU AMD Ryzen 3600X (Dedicated CPU usage)
  • 4 GB RAM
  • 20 GB NVMe SSD disk drive
  • 1 GBps network connection.
  • Unmetered traffic (Fair use).
  • Location: Frankfurt, Germany or Montreal, Canada
  • OS: Most Linux distros, Windows with ISO (No license) or your own ISO (ticket if n/a).
  • 1x IPv4 address (more possible with ticket).
  • 1x /80 IPv6 subnet
  • Fully managable DDoS Protection (Game Anti-DDoS, Anti-DDoS Pro) + Notifications to Discord.
  • Instant setup! (Depending on stock and fraud check).

These specs with coupon code only € 10,50 / month (Excl. VAT for EU customers).

Direct order Frankfurt: https://autovm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=4
Direct order Montreal: https://autovm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=8

For more info visit our site’s friendly livechat, or e-mail us!

We accept Paypal, Bitpay, Credit Card, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@autovm.com

Our company info:

AUTOVM (by NOVOS BV). We’re a company located in Belgium
